longBusinessSummary: Emami Paper Mills Limited manufactures and sells paper and paper board products in India. Its products include newsprint, packaging board, writing and printing paper, and kraft paper, as well as specialty papers. Emami Paper Mills Limited serves business-to-business customers consisting of front-line printers/converters, brands, end-use customers, and Indian media houses, as well as retail and institutional consumers. The company exports its products. Emami Paper Mills Limited was incorporated in 1981 and is based in Kolkata, India.
